attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WILL THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORT TAKE POSITIVE STEPS TO MAKE IT A STATUTORY REQUIREMENT FOR MOBILITY SCOOTER USERS TO TAKE OUT INSURANCE.AS THE NUMBER OF THESE SCOOTERS IS INCREASING YEAR BY YEAR IT IS VITALLY IMPORTANT THAT THERE IS A STATUTORY REQUIREMENT FOR ALL USERS TO HAVE INSURANCE COVER FOR BOTH THE SAFETY OF THE USER AS WELL AS THE PEDESTRIAN.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Also, please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
